text: @realDonaldTrump So you beliitle Illinois governor on worldwide TV when your nation has ever increasing catastrophic numbers of infection and death!  I thank the good Lord you ARE NOT Australia’s PM!! Disgraceful embarrassing immature leadership!! #Trump #COVID19 #Illinois #TrumpMadness https://t.co/vYktrNF9an
